Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am playing KSP 0.90 with MechJeb and a few science mods (D Magic - brilliant!). Often when I take contracts and then go out of the game contracts that I have accepted disappear. Does this happen to anyone else?

Thanks.

I have the same here, in OSX Yosemite.

From time to time, when i came back to the game (reopen it) the accepted contract's i already have, all is missed.

I really don't know what it is. I have a bunch of mods, but no one that mess with contracts.
This just happened to me as well. Very odd and frustrating

I've had this happen five times now. Very frustrating.

I've got Contracts+ and Contract Configurator installed. I'm wondering if one of them is a problem.
